jump_scares.spoiler: Tom has some visions of a girl while he is by the fridge
Tom sits up on the couch and turns on the TV, when he lies back down on the couch, there is a girl sitting next to him. [Video]
Jake suddenly begins talking while Debbie is listening on the baby monitor
Someone runs up some stairs beside Maggie while she is walking down a dark alley
The dead girl can be seen in the medicine cabinet mirror as Maggie closes it
Maggie walks past the dead girl in the basement
Someone grabs Tom and he has a series of visions while Lisa is hypnotizing him
A decomposed body is shown close up on screen, accompanied by a screaming noise
